Module jGame
Package jGame.core.launcher

Class GameStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.core.launcher.GameStateManager
  • public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for managing game states and performing initialization and termination of different game states.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nuno Pereira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static GameState board
      The board GameState every game must have.

      • addGameState

        public static void addGameState​(java.lang.String gameStateDescr,
                                GameState gameState)
        Adds a new game state to the internal map. If there is no game state registered, makes gameState the current game state.
        Parameters:
        gameStateDescr - the key in the map referring to the gameState
        gameState - the gameState to add
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • removeGameState

        public static void removeGameState​(java.lang.String gameStateDescr)
        Removes the given game state.
        Parameters:
        gameStateDescr - the description of the game state object to be removed
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • changeGameState

        public static void changeGameState​(java.lang.String gameStateDescr)
        Changes the current game state.
        Parameters:
        gameStateDescr - the GameState to make the current one
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • addEntityToBoard
